mapper.select: select coordi_img.coordi_no as coordiNo, filepath as filePath, coordi.user_Id as userId, coordi_content as coordiContent, coordi.gender, season, temperature, reg_date as regDate, hashtag as hashTag, coordi.del_yn as delYN, nickName as nickName from coordi_img left join coordi on (coordi_img.coordi_no=coordi.coordi_no) left join member on (coordi.user_Id=member.user_Id) where top_YN='Y' and season=#{season} and coordi.del_yn='N'
